title: Use the parseInt Function
content: The parseInt() function parses a string and returns an integer, Here's an example:
The above function converts the string 007 to the integer 7. If the first character in the string can't be converted into a number, then it returns NaN.

exercises.instruction: Use parseInt() in the convertToInteger function so it converts the input string str into an integer, and returns it.

hint: convertToInteger should use the parseInt() function
